issues.message: Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<int, uint>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<int, uint>'.

Consider using more general type 'Microsoft.ML.PredictionEngineBase<ImageClassification.ImageDataStructures.ImageNetData, ImageClassification.ImageDataStructures.ImageNetPrediction>' instead of 'Microsoft.ML.PredictionEngine<ImageClassification.ImageDataStructures.ImageNetData, ImageClassification.ImageDataStructures.ImageNetPrediction>'.
